channel.title: Pages on Lunafreya
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Lunafreya

item.title: About
item.description: Lunafreya is theme which using J3A library for static web pages encryption. J3A library adding new features to static web page such as authentication, authorization and accounting. You can create multiple user accounts and roles. Improve your page with this. J3A is free for everyone. Just try it. Username is ‘user’ and password is ‘user’. There is only one encrypted page named secret. There is also ‘Registered’ role (user has this one).

item.title: Secret page
item.description: As you can see, this page is only for registered users. Here, we’ve got only one user ‘user’ with password ‘user’ in role ‘Registered’, but you can define your own roles or users. Try it! Follow this link: J3A.

item.title: Access denied
item.description: Access to the page content was denied! You have to login to view page content.
